federation.serviceSdl:
# GraphQL schema example
#
# https://gqlgen.com/getting-started/
type Account @key(fields: "id") {
    id: ID!
    name: String!
    email: String!
    password: String!
    totalPostLike: Float!
    totalChatMessage: Float!
    messages: [ChatMessage] @external
    rooms: [ChatRoom] @external
    posts: [Post] @external
    postLikes: [PostLike] @external
}

type ChatMessage @key(fields: "id") @extends {
    id: ID! @external
    content: String! @external
    accountId: ID! @external
    account: Account! @requires(fields: "accountId")
    room: ChatRoom! @external
}

type ChatRoomMember @key(fields: "id") @extends {
    id: ID! @external
    accountId: ID! @external
    account: Account! @requires(fields: "accountId")
    room: ChatRoom! @external
}

type ChatRoom @key(fields: "id") @extends {
    id: ID! @external
    name: String! @external
    description: String! @external
    members: [ChatRoomMember] @external
    messages: [ChatMessage] @external
}

type Post @key(fields: "id") @extends {
    id: ID! @external
    title: String! @external
    content: String! @external
    accountId: ID! @external
    account: Account! @requires(fields: "accountId")
    likes: [PostLike] @external
}

type PostLike @key(fields: "id") @extends {
    id: ID! @external
    post: Post! @external
    accountId: ID! @external
    account: Account! @requires(fields: "accountId")
}

type Query {
    accounts: [Account!]!
    account(id: ID!): Account
}

input AccountInput {
  name: String!
  email: String!
  password: String!
}

type Mutation {
    createAccount(input: AccountInput!): Account!
    updateAccount(id: ID!, input: AccountInput!): Account!
    deleteAccount(id: ID!): Account!
}

type ChatMessage @key(fields: "id") {
    id: ID!
    content: String!
    accountId: ID!
    account: Account! @external
    room: ChatRoom!
}

type ChatRoomMember @key(fields: "id") {
    id: ID!
    accountId: ID!
    account: Account! @external
    room: ChatRoom!
}

type ChatRoom @key(fields: "id") {
    id: ID!
    name: String!
    description: String
    members: [ChatRoomMember]
    messages: [ChatMessage]
}

type Post @key(fields: "id") {
    id: ID!
    title: String!
    content: String!
    accountId: ID!
    account: Account! @external
    likes: [PostLike]
}

type PostLike @key(fields: "id") {
    id: ID!
    post: Post!
    accountId: ID!
    account: Account! @external
}

type Account @key(fields: "id") @extends {
    id: ID! @external
    name: String! @external
    email: String! @external
    password: String! @external
    totalPostLike: Float! @external
    totalChatMessage: Float! @external
    messages: [ChatMessage]
    rooms: [ChatRoom]
    posts: [Post]
    postLikes: [PostLike]
}

type Query {
    chatRooms: [ChatRoom]
    chatRoomMembers(chatRoomId: ID!): [ChatRoomMember]
    chatMessages(chatRoomId: ID!): [ChatMessage]
    posts: [Post]
}

type Mutation {
    addChatRoom(name: String!, description: String): ChatRoom
    addMemberToChatRoom(accountId: ID!, chatRoomId: ID!): ChatRoomMember
    addChatMessage(chatRoomId: ID!, accountId: ID!, content: String!): ChatMessage
    addPost(accountId: ID!, title: String!, content: String!): Post
    likePost(postId: ID!, accountId: ID!): Post
    unlikePost(postId: ID!, accountId: ID!): Post
}

engineConfig.graphqlSchema:
schema {
  query: Query
  mutation: Mutation
}

directive @tag(name: String!) repeatable on ARGUMENT_DEFINITION | ENUM | ENUM_VALUE | FIELD_DEFINITION | INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION | INPUT_OBJECT | INTERFACE | OBJECT | SCALAR | UNION

type Account {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  email: String!
  password: String!
  totalPostLike: Float!
  totalChatMessage: Float!
  messages: [ChatMessage]
  rooms: [ChatRoom]
  posts: [Post]
  postLikes: [PostLike]
}

type ChatMessage {
  id: ID!
  content: String!
  accountId: ID!
  account: Account!
  room: ChatRoom!
}

type ChatRoomMember {
  id: ID!
  accountId: ID!
  account: Account!
  room: ChatRoom!
}

type ChatRoom {
  id: ID!
  name: String!
  description: String
  members: [ChatRoomMember]
  messages: [ChatMessage]
}

type Post {
  id: ID!
  title: String!
  content: String!
  accountId: ID!
  account: Account!
  likes: [PostLike]
}

type PostLike {
  id: ID!
  post: Post!
  accountId: ID!
  account: Account!
}

type Query {
  accounts: [Account!]!
  account(id: ID!): Account
  chatRooms: [ChatRoom]
  chatRoomMembers(chatRoomId: ID!): [ChatRoomMember]
  chatMessages(chatRoomId: ID!): [ChatMessage]
  posts: [Post]
}

input AccountInput {
  name: String!
  email: String!
  password: String!
}

type Mutation {
  createAccount(input: AccountInput!): Account!
  updateAccount(id: ID!, input: AccountInput!): Account!
  deleteAccount(id: ID!): Account!
  addChatRoom(name: String!, description: String): ChatRoom
  addMemberToChatRoom(accountId: ID!, chatRoomId: ID!): ChatRoomMember
  addChatMessage(chatRoomId: ID!, accountId: ID!, content: String!): ChatMessage
  addPost(accountId: ID!, title: String!, content: String!): Post
  likePost(postId: ID!, accountId: ID!): Post
  unlikePost(postId: ID!, accountId: ID!): Post
}

stringStorage.ca1dc15d6b3c0edd8c09b4728a36e5b81c79d0f4:
schema {
  query: Query
  mutation: Mutation
}

directive @extends on INTERFACE | OBJECT

directive @external on FIELD_DEFINITION | OBJECT

directive @key(fields: openfed__FieldSet!, resolvable: Boolean = true) repeatable on INTERFACE | OBJECT

directive @provides(fields: openfed__FieldSet!) on FIELD_DEFINITION

directive @requires(fields: openfed__FieldSet!) on FIELD_DEFINITION

directive @tag(name: String!) repeatable on ARGUMENT_DEFINITION | ENUM | ENUM_VALUE | FIELD_DEFINITION | INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION | INPUT_OBJECT | INTERFACE | OBJECT | SCALAR | UNION

type Account @key(fields: "id") {
  email: String!
  id: ID!
  messages: [ChatMessage] @external
  name: String!
  password: String!
  postLikes: [PostLike] @external
  posts: [Post] @external
  rooms: [ChatRoom] @external
  totalChatMessage: Float!
  totalPostLike: Float!
}

input AccountInput {
  email: String!
  name: String!
  password: String!
}

type ChatMessage @key(fields: "id") @extends {
  account: Account! @requires(fields: "accountId")
  accountId: ID! @external
  content: String! @external
  id: ID! @external
  room: ChatRoom! @external
}

type ChatRoom @key(fields: "id") @extends {
  description: String! @external
  id: ID! @external
  members: [ChatRoomMember] @external
  messages: [ChatMessage] @external
  name: String! @external
}

type ChatRoomMember @key(fields: "id") @extends {
  account: Account! @requires(fields: "accountId")
  accountId: ID! @external
  id: ID! @external
  room: ChatRoom! @external
}

type Mutation {
  createAccount(input: AccountInput!): Account!
  deleteAccount(id: ID!): Account!
  updateAccount(id: ID!, input: AccountInput!): Account!
}

type Post @key(fields: "id") @extends {
  account: Account! @requires(fields: "accountId")
  accountId: ID! @external
  content: String! @external
  id: ID! @external
  likes: [PostLike] @external
  title: String! @external
}

type PostLike @key(fields: "id") @extends {
  account: Account! @requires(fields: "accountId")
  accountId: ID! @external
  id: ID! @external
  post: Post! @external
}

type Query {
  account(id: ID!): Account
  accounts: [Account!]!
}

scalar openfed__FieldSet
stringStorage.5a71e979275f957271d426e886de18cb4c18200a:
schema {
  query: Query
  mutation: Mutation
}

directive @extends on INTERFACE | OBJECT

directive @external on FIELD_DEFINITION | OBJECT

directive @key(fields: openfed__FieldSet!, resolvable: Boolean = true) repeatable on INTERFACE | OBJECT

directive @provides(fields: openfed__FieldSet!) on FIELD_DEFINITION

directive @requires(fields: openfed__FieldSet!) on FIELD_DEFINITION

directive @tag(name: String!) repeatable on ARGUMENT_DEFINITION | ENUM | ENUM_VALUE | FIELD_DEFINITION | INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION | INPUT_OBJECT | INTERFACE | OBJECT | SCALAR | UNION

type Account @key(fields: "id") @extends {
  email: String! @external
  id: ID! @external
  messages: [ChatMessage]
  name: String! @external
  password: String! @external
  postLikes: [PostLike]
  posts: [Post]
  rooms: [ChatRoom]
  totalChatMessage: Float! @external
  totalPostLike: Float! @external
}

type ChatMessage @key(fields: "id") {
  account: Account! @external
  accountId: ID!
  content: String!
  id: ID!
  room: ChatRoom!
}

type ChatRoom @key(fields: "id") {
  description: String
  id: ID!
  members: [ChatRoomMember]
  messages: [ChatMessage]
  name: String!
}

type ChatRoomMember @key(fields: "id") {
  account: Account! @external
  accountId: ID!
  id: ID!
  room: ChatRoom!
}

type Mutation {
  addChatMessage(accountId: ID!, chatRoomId: ID!, content: String!): ChatMessage
  addChatRoom(description: String, name: String!): ChatRoom
  addMemberToChatRoom(accountId: ID!, chatRoomId: ID!): ChatRoomMember
  addPost(accountId: ID!, content: String!, title: String!): Post
  likePost(accountId: ID!, postId: ID!): Post
  unlikePost(accountId: ID!, postId: ID!): Post
}

type Post @key(fields: "id") {
  account: Account! @external
  accountId: ID!
  content: String!
  id: ID!
  likes: [PostLike]
  title: String!
}

type PostLike @key(fields: "id") {
  account: Account! @external
  accountId: ID!
  id: ID!
  post: Post!
}

type Query {
  chatMessages(chatRoomId: ID!): [ChatMessage]
  chatRoomMembers(chatRoomId: ID!): [ChatRoomMember]
  chatRooms: [ChatRoom]
  posts: [Post]
}

scalar openfed__FieldSet
